mapper.select: SELECT l.lid lid,l.labelname labelname FROM task t INNER JOIN task_label tl ON t.tid=tl.taskid INNER JOIN label l on tl.labelid = l.lid WHERE t.tid=#{taskid}
SELECT l.lid,l.labelname FROM label l,task_label tl,task_document td WHERE td.documentid=#{docId} AND td.taskid=tl.taskid AND l.lid=tl.labelid
SELECT l.lid,l.labelname FROM label l,insta_label tl,task_document td WHERE td.documentid=#{docId} AND td.taskid=tl.taskid AND l.lid=tl.lebelid AND tl.lebelindex="1"
SELECT l.lid,l.labelname FROM label l,insta_label tl,task_document td WHERE td.documentid=#{docId} AND td.taskid=tl.taskid AND l.lid=tl.lebelid AND tl.lebelindex="2"
